sentences.en: A barrel - organ was wheezing out an old tune.
sentences.cn: 一架手摇风琴正在呼哧呼哧地奏着一首古老的曲子.

sentences.en: a barrel bound with iron hoops
sentences.cn: 用铁箍箍紧的桶

sentences.en: a barrel for collecting rainwater
sentences.cn: 接雨水的桶

sentences.en: A barrel swells in the middle.
sentences.cn: 水桶中部隆起.

sentences.en: Drain off the rest of the wine from this barrel.
sentences.cn: 把桶里剩余的酒排出去.

sentences.en: During the negotiations the opposing faction had us over a barrel.
sentences.cn: 在谈判中，那个对抗的派别使我们一筹莫展

sentences.en: He pushed the barrel of the gun into the other man's open mouth.
sentences.cn: 他把枪管插入另一个人张开着的嘴里。

sentences.en: I drew off three pints of beer from the barrel.
sentences.cn: 我从酒桶里抽出三品脱啤酒.

sentences.en: life is not exactly a barrel of laughs at the moment.
sentences.cn: 此刻生活并非欢乐无限。

sentences.en: Oil prices were closing at $19.76 a barrel.
sentences.cn: 油价收于每桶19.76美元。

sentences.en: paid cash on the barrel for the car.
sentences.cn: 付现金买了这辆车

sentences.en: Political power grows out of the barrel of a gun.
sentences.cn: 枪杆子里面出政权。

sentences.en: Pulling his rifle to his shoulder he squinted along the barrel.
sentences.cn: 他把枪顶肩,眯起眼睛瞄准.

sentences.en: The gun barrel grated against the floor.
sentences.cn: 枪管拖在地上发出刺耳的声音。

sentences.en: The man rolled the barrel into the yard.
sentences.cn: 那个人把圆桶滚进院子.

sentences.en: The suppers are always a barrel of laughs.
sentences.cn: 晚餐总是充满欢笑。

sentences.en: The wine is aged in oak barrels.
sentences.cn: 这种葡萄酒是用橡木酒桶放陈的。

sentences.en: They rolled the barrel along the road.
sentences.cn: 他们把木桶沿着大路滚过去.

sentences.en: To keep warm they burnt wood in a rusty oil barrel.
sentences.cn: 他们在一只生锈的油桶里烧木柴来保暖。

sentences.en: Use this wad of cloth to plug the barrel.
sentences.cn: 用这软布把桶塞上.

sentences.en: You'll eat so much your belly'll be like a barrel.
sentences.cn: 你会吃得肚子鼓鼓的，像个大酒桶。

words.tran_cn: 装桶；磨研；疾驶（barrel的过去分词）
把…装入桶内；高速行驶（barrel的过去分词）

phrases.tran_cn: 负畸变；桶形畸变；桶形失真

phrases.phrase: on the barrel 或 on the barrelhead
phrases.tran_cn: 以现金的，现付的：不承认、不给或不要信用卡的
困境：很难摆脱的艰难处境
放猪肉的桶；（为讨好或报答支持者的）政治拨款
(非正式， 主 美)全力以赴；全情投入

trans.tran_en: a large curved container with a flat top and bottom, made of wood or metal, and used for storing beer, wine etc
